sense.def:
To wrestle with someone
pomeni z nekom se bojevati tako, da ga prisilimo v položaj, v katerem občuti bolečine, ali ga vržemo na tla, vendar ga ne udarimo.

cit.quote: spoprijeti se, pomeriti se v rokoborbi

sense.def:
To wrestle with a problem
pomeni spopasti se z neko težavo.

seg.quote: For decades, mathematicians have wrestled with this problem.
